title: Update
notes: Updates to download manager integration - try to launch it and only alert user if it actually fails.

title: Update
notes:
• Added support for app release types
  • Fixed an issue with long version names in Android apps

title: Update
notes:
• Added support for app release types
  • Fixed an issue with long version names in Android apps

title: Update
notes: Fixes an issue where apps would not load releases when a release was distributed to individual testers

title: Update
notes:
Fixed issues in this release:

  • Attempt Security Provider upgrade even if TLS 1.2 is already supported
  • Unable to install app update due to message indicating there is a newer version installed
  • Organizations not correctly ordered by name all of the time
  • Release notes getting cut off in some cases

title: Update
notes:
• Revised login screen to provide more clarity
  • Improved login process so users won't get stuck anymore on a blank page by improving the actual page with the ability to manually continue

Fixed issues:

  • Fixed an issue when going to an app release detail then returning to the app and reloading (now properly shows the app information, not previous release information)
  • Fixed a crash when tapping a release downloading notification
  • Fixed issues with our TLS 1.2 requirement on older devices

title: Update
notes:
Fix issues with:

  • display_name null or blank in API responses
  • Download service binding issues due to platform issue on Android 9.0
  • Added resiliency in various places

title: Update
notes:
• Fixed sign in issues by moving to the device browser for signing in
  • Resolved known issues around installing apps on devices with Android Oreo or newer
  • Fixed several other reported issues

title: Update
notes:
• Overall improved performance
  • Completely redesigned app details view addressing former issues
  • Improved error and empty state handling
  • Better focus on Android apps
  • Indicate the owner of apps in the app list
  • Fixed an issue that froze the app in a non-refreshable empty state
  • Fixed markdown rendering issue
  • Fixed a caching issue that was showing old data
  • Fixed an issue were releases restricted to a Distribution Group on HockeyApp didn't show up
  • Fixed an issue when rendering organizations in the sidebar broke the layout
  • Fixed an issue that prevented loading the avatar
  • Fixed plenty of other small issues

title: Update
notes:
• Overall improved performance
  • Completely redesigned app details view addressing former issues
  • Improved error and empty state handling
  • Better focus on Android apps
  • Indicate the owner of apps in the app list
  • Fixed an issue that froze the app in a non-refreshable empty state
  • Fixed markdown rendering issue
  • Fixed a caching issue that was showing old data
  • Fixed an issue were releases restricted to a Distribution Group on HockeyApp didn't show up
  • Fixed an issue when rendering organizations in the sidebar broke the layout
  • Fixed an issue that prevented loading the avatar
  • Fixed plenty of other small issues
